recommended_degree: Psikologi, Manajemen Sumber Daya Manusia, Pendidikan Bisnis (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Design and implement competency-based learning programs, from module development to facilitation.
2. Manage the annual learning budget effectively, ensuring compliance with OJK training regulations.
3. Exposure in Lead development programs for Sales Agency, Bancassurance, and Executive levels will be additional value.
4. Support succession planning and talent management, including identifying high-potential employees and building leadership pipelines.
5. Drive culture activation initiatives such as EVP campaigns, values internalization, and company-wide engagement activities.
6. Manage employee engagement surveys, analyze results, and lead follow-up action planning.
7. Organize company-wide events to enhance employee engagement and strengthen company culture.
